controllers

Class FloorController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controllers.FloorController

  • public class FloorController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller to show the floor plan with all it's devices and to configure them based in the data stored in the FXML file. That way, the floor plan can be designed in sceneBuilder and then the devices corresponding to each control can be added in the FXML file as control userData.

      Configures a device that will be shown as a slider in the view.

      Configures a device that will be shown as a TextField by subscribing it to the corresponding Topic.
      private void configureToggleDevice(JFXToggleButton toggleButton)
      Configures a toggle device that will receive boolean values to be subscribed to the topic and listen to those values.

      Initializes the floor brightness device to set the floor plan image brightness corresponding to the received value.

      Initializes the controller by loading the FXML file that contains the view and the related devices to each control.

      Initializes the devices contained in the floor plan based on their Control types.

    • Method Detail

      • initController

        public javafx.scene.Node initController(java.lang.String floorFXMLFile)
                                 throws java.io.IOException
        Initializes the controller by loading the FXML file that contains the view and the related devices to each control.
        Parameters:
        floorFXMLFile - The floor plan FXML file.
        Returns:
        The root node of the view.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If the FXML file can't be loaded.

      • setModel

        public void setModel(FXModel model)
        Sets the application model to be used in the controller.
        Parameters:
        model -

      • initDevices

        private void initDevices()
        Initializes the devices contained in the floor plan based on their Control types.

      • configureTextDevice

        private void configureTextDevice(JFXTextField textField)
        Configures a device that will be shown as a TextField by subscribing it to the corresponding Topic.
        Parameters:
        textField - The texfield control to be configured and that contains the device data.

      • configureSliderDevice

        private void configureSliderDevice(JFXSlider slider)
        Configures a device that will be shown as a slider in the view. If the device topic is named lightIntensity it will call the corresponding method to set this particular device.
        Parameters:
        slider - The slider to be configured.

      • configureToggleDevice

        private void configureToggleDevice(JFXToggleButton toggleButton)
        Configures a toggle device that will receive boolean values to be subscribed to the topic and listen to those values.
        Parameters:
        toggleButton - The toggle to be configured.

      • initBrightnessDevice

        private void initBrightnessDevice(Topic lightTopic)
        Initializes the floor brightness device to set the floor plan image brightness corresponding to the received value.
        Parameters:
        lightTopic - The topic to be subscribed to.
